unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Just Got Brighter!**
normalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Just Got Brighter!**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream *ghar* in Mumbai or Bangalore? Good news! Banks are rolling out the red carpet with tempting home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream *ghar* in Mumbai or Bangalore? Good news! Banks are rolling out the red carpet with tempting home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.

unnormalised: HDFC and SBI have slashed interest rates by up to 0.5%, making it easier to afford that extra *puja* room. Plus, many lenders are offering zero processing fees – that's like getting free biryani after buying a house!
normalised: H D F C and S B I have slashed interest rates by up to zero point five percent, making it easier to afford that extra *puja* room. Plus, many lenders are offering zero processing fees – that's like getting free biryani after buying a house!

unnormalised: ICICI Bank is even sweetening the deal with pre-approved loans up to Rs. 5 Crores for salaried individuals. So, ditch the rented apartment and invest in your own piece of India!
normalised: I C I C I Bank is even sweetening the deal with pre-approved loans up to rupee five crores for salaried individuals. So, ditch the rented apartment and invest in your own piece of India!

unnormalised: Don't wait too long, these offers are valid till Diwali. Remember to compare all options and read the fine print before signing on the dotted line. Imagine decorating your new home with Diwali diyas – a dream come true! Maybe even a trip to Kerala for Onam next year, now that you’re saving on rent! What are you waiting for? Get cracking!
